summary: A worn-out businessman and a beautician on the run collide in a Paris airport. Love arrives, all its hurdles be damned.
cast: Juliette Binoche|Jean Reno|Sergi López|Scali Delpeyrat|Karine Belly|Raoul Billerey|Nadège Beausson-Diagne|Alice Taglioni|Jérôme Keen|Sébastien Lalanne|Michel Lepriol|Mbembo|Laurence Colussi|Lucy Harrison|Rebecca Steele|Thiam Aïssatou|Édouard Daladier|Larry King
keywords: boyfriend girlfriend relationship|delayed flight|culture clash|father son relationship|f rated
title: Jet Lag
